title: Strengthening Clinical Practice Competencies: Short-Intensive Digital Literacy Enhancement Course for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more instructional design models suitable for the digital age and explain their application strategies in science classes.
Mobile-based microlearning content can be utilized to design learner-engaged science classes
Understand the concept of digital identity and develop strategies to manage emotional factors arising during technology integration in science classes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
